Title: Relates to the health care and mental hygiene worker bonuses
Summary: Includes any parent or parent of a minor who cares for such minor child with an intellectual or developmental disability within the health care and mental hygiene worker bonuses.
LawCode: Amd ยง367-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the health care and mental hygiene worker bonuses
